title: BLACK FRIDAY Local-Shopping Expo - LA
desc: A BLACK FRIDAY  STRESS-FREE SHOPPING EVENT Supporting?local small-businesses in Los Angeles, CA.? ? ? "Come To? Shop ...Stay For The? Fun " Local Residents of Los Angeles? don't miss this great opportunity to do your holiday?shopping with some amazing local businesses.? Attend our STRESS-FREE expo during three of the most important shopping days of the year: ? ? STRESS-FREE HOLIDAY SHOPPING? ? If you enjoy the great experiences that come from shopping with local small businesses, then this Expo is JUST FOR YOU ? Friday 11:00 AM - 9:00 PM ?- ? Saturday 11:00 AM - 9:00 PM Q. ?? How much time should I allow to attend? A .?? The amount of time to visit the Expo varies for each attendee. Most attendees could spend a couple of hours doing their holiday shopping, or buying new products, meeting with local businesses and having fun viewing the specialty events. ? ? Q.? How much does it cost to attend? A. ?Our 3-day expo is FREE and open to the public. ? Q:? Is the location wheel chair accessible? A:? Yes. ? Q:? I am in a wheelchair and will be bringing and additional person for this purpose. ?Will they have to register to? A:? They will not have to register.? We are happy to have you join us and will work with you to accommodate your participation.
